documents_dashboard_document_ID_DE: A photocopy of the front and back of your proof of identity (national ID card, passport)
documents_dashboard_document_PROOF_OF_AD: Proof of address with your full name and the address indicated in your profile, dated within the last 3 months (e.g., bank statements, utility bill [water, electricity]).
documents_dashboard_document_CORPORATE_I: Certificate of incorporation dated within the last 3 months.
documents_dashboard_document_ADMINISTRAT: Issuing authority: proof of company’s status
documents_dashboard_document_ASSOCIATION: Copy of the company’s articles of association and minutes of the last general meeting held.
documents_dashboard_document_individual_: Useful documents containing information about your circumstances (residential address, change of address)
documents_dashboard_document_corporation: If you are not listed in the trade and companies register or articles of association, you can attach a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person listed in the official documentation.
documents_dashboard_document_association: If you are not listed in the certificate of incorporation or articles of association, you can attach a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person listed therein.
documents_dashboard_document_administrat: If you are not listed in the trade and companies register or articles of association, you can attach a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person listed in the official documentation.
documents_dashboard_document_other_OTHER: Useful documents containing information about your circumstances (residential address, change of address, etc.)
